alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Northern Gila County; White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 23 at 4:58PM MST until January 23 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches, with locally higher amounts up to 4 inches in heavier snow bands. * WHERE...Areas near Alpine, Forest Lakes, Heber-Overgaard, Payson, Pine-Strawberry, Pinetop-Lakeside, Show Low and Whiteriver. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions, with very poor visibility at times. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Additional snow forecast from 4 PM Today to 11 PM Today: Alpine 0 to 1 inches Forest Lakes 1 to 3 inches Heber-Overgaard 1 to 2 inches Payson 1 to 3 inches Pine-Strawberry 1 to 3 inches Pinetop-Lkside 0 to 1 inches Show Low 0 to 1 inches Whiteriver 0 to 1 inches .
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mogollon Rim; Northern Gila County; White Mountains
